name: 2D Shooter (JakeMac)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project. Modifications: 

1) Attackers are no longer static; they follow after the player.

2) A spawner has been placed (and adjusted accordingly so the levels aren't too difficult). They spawn extra attackers, a max of 10.

3) The cursor has been changed to one of the already built-in sprites.

4) The title of the game has changed, viewable on the main menu screen.

Credits : Jake MacTavish
